title: Chatbot Delusions Can Take Heavy Users to Dark Places
description: A growing number of people say they’ve experienced delusions during lengthy conversations with AI chatbots — particularly with OpenAI’s popular ChatGPT. Bloomberg’s Rachel Metz discusses the impact and reaction to these cases with Tim Stenovec on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)

title: C3.ai Gains After Report Says Software Company Is Exploring Sale
description: C3.ai Inc., a maker of data-analysis software, gained after Reuters reported the company is exploring a sale.

title: CoreWeave Revenue Tops Estimates in Sign of Surging AI Demand
description: CoreWeave Inc. topped analysts’ estimates with its quarterly sales, a sign demand remains strong for the company’s AI computing services.
